name: THE SOULS SOURCE
short_description:
THE SOULS SOURCE - OPEN DEVELOPMENT ONLINE & OFFLINE ACTION RPG

THE SOULS SOURCE - Is the Open development Community driven Open Sourçe Action Rpg Game / and FlagSHip Product of SOULS STUDIOS Within their SOULS - OPEN MASSIVE NETWORK Program.

SOULS Projects are the delivering of Open Development Sourçe Communitarian Game Development, Code Assets & Resources for the Delivering of Open Source Rpg Chose Your Way Games , Delivering Open development Within Various Game platforms as CRYENGINE / UDK / UNITY / TORQUE / RYZOM / MYST / BIG WORLD / GAMEBRIO / PROFENIX S2 / Among others.

Within a Deep Ramification Online Open Communitarian Artistic Development Structure the SOULS Project Promises Revolution The Open Development On-line Rpg Universe.

Join now or Community at Souls.sourceforge.org
summary: THE SOULS SOURCE - OPEN DEVELOPMENT ONLINE & OFFLINE ACTION RPG
